radiographic_examinations.findings: Minimal dependent atelectasis in the imaged lung bases; calcified pleural plaque in the left posterior sulcus; a 1.3 cm hypodense lesion in the left liver lobe; scattered subcentimeter hypodensities in the liver; normal pancreas, spleen, and kidneys; enlarged and edematous appendix with wall thickening measuring 1.1 cm in diameter; no evidence of necrosis or perforation; 1.4 cm nodule at the left adrenal gland; no lymphadenopathy; no evidence of worrisome osseous lesions or acute fracture.
